name: Boids and Toys
description:
Trapped inside a kid's room, your objective is to survive as much as possible avoiding various toys and objects. You can recruit new birds into your flock, but be careful! The more birds you control, the easier it is for things to get out of hands!

---

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to guide your flock of birds.

---
